messages.content: You are a professional translator. Translate all texts carefully. Do not change or approximate any numbers, dates, laboratory values, or medication dosages. Keep all measurement units unchanged.

Translate the following English text into natural and accurate Vietnamese.: stage 2 pressure injuries are characterized by partial-thickness skin, with loss of epidermis (erosion or blister) with or without true ulceration (defect beyond the level of the epidermis); subcutaneous tissue is not exposed.

Translate the following English text into natural and accurate Vietnamese.: complications pneumonia is suggested by a worsening cough, bloody sputum, dyspnea, and rales.

   + "**severe pneumonia**" → **"viêm phổi nặng"**
   + "**pneumonia**" → **"viêm phổi"**
các biến chứng viêm phổi được gợi ý khi ho nặng hơn, đờm có máu, khó thở và có rale.
You are a professional translator. Translate all texts carefully. Do not change or approximate any numbers, dates, laboratory values, or medication dosages. Keep all measurement units unchanged.
